summary: Each year, we make more than 1,000 recommendations to help improve the federal government. We alert department heads to the recommendations where they can save the most money, address issues on our High Risk List , or significantly improve government operations. This report outlines our 38 priority open recommendations for DHS as of August 2021. The recommendations relate to emergency preparedness, border and transportation security...
title: Priority Open Recommendations: Department of Homeland Security
